title: DOTA 2 IS BETTER THAN LEAGUE
body: Scammers always scam me all the time, I WANT MY MONEY BACKKKKKKK

replies.body:
> Scammers always scam me all the time, I WANT MY MONEY BACKKKKKKK

hahahahahahaha.
Oh wait, you're being serious. Let me laugh even harder.
AHAHAHAHAHAHA!
sorry, your comebacks are soooooo bad it made me tired {{summoner:3}}
Then maybe you should stop reading them. After all, I wouldn't want you to exhaust yourself.
No need to be mad, send a support ticket.
They'd be wasting their time. Riot don't give refunds for idiocy.

Refunds? For him? HAHAHAHAHA
Maybe? just for him anyway
GIVE ME YOUR NEEDLESSLY LARGE ROD {{item:1058}}

Thank you for you very insightful discussion sparking topic. 
It has changed the way that I've viewed the world.
